CustomField.description: This is used for the SREC CS Product sizing. It is the total dollar amount a customer spends annually on their electric utility bill for this account. It is initially filled in with an estimate from the customer/partner during the CS application process, then filled in by Ops with the QCed amount.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for SREC CS Product sizing. It's the total dollar amount spent annually on the electric utility bill. It is initially filled in with an estimate from the customer/partner during the CS application process, then filled in by Ops with the QCed amount.
CustomField.label: Annual Cost of Electricity
